description: A stub webserver used to enable blackbox testing of applications that call external web urls.         For example, an application that consumes data from an external REST api.  The usage pattern is intended to be very       much like using a mock framework.
longdescription: A stub webserver used to enable blackbox testing of applications that call external web urls.         For example, an application that consumes data from an external REST api.  The usage pattern is intended to be very       much like using a mock framework.
